articles.description: ANDROID users need to be aware of a dangerous new Google Chrome bug which research suggests could affect millions of people around the world.
articles.content:
Lookout has also conducted research to see how many Android users could be affected by this Google Chrome flaw.
At the time of carrying out their study, Lookout estimated that up to 50 percent of An… [+1101 chars]

articles.title: Kylie Minogue becomes shareholder in British streaming start-up Roxi - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Roxi is hoping to hook in customers with exclusive celebrity playlists from stars such as Kylie Minogue and Robbie Williams
articles.content:
Kylie Minogue has become a shareholder in a British music streaming start-up and is the face of the companys new advertising campaign.
